DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , prospective , observational study describe management relapse refractory chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) patient . Data collect 2 year .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study MabThera/Rituxan ( Rituximab ) Patients With Relapsing Refractory Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year age Diagnosis relapse refractory chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) first second relapse Previous treatment MabThera/Rituxan MabThera/Rituxan treatment plan current relapse Richter syndrome Life expectancy < 6 month
